Bio

Dallis King is a 23 year old educator, artist and programmer.

Current Work

I currently work as the Director of Education at the Toronto-based startup Hatch Canada which focuses on teaching children aged 7-17 programming. I’m developping self-paced, progressive curriculums to get young people excited about the ability to create with code. Much of what I’m hoping to write here will be based around my experiments in a classroom filled with alternate-learning stratagies.

Past Work

Previously, I’ve worked creating art through code. Some of my past projects can be found in the Projects section of this website.

Contact Me

If you’d like to talk you can always email me!
